title: Can Any1 plz help me, i am stuck in a ghost game
body: I started a practice tool game while I was waiting for my friends. When I exist the practice game and the client showed that I have to reconnect. So I closed the client and reopen it, the client automatically trying to reconnect and it showed that **"unable to reconnect to service, please check your network"**. I  restart my laptop, doesn't work. I launch lol on my mac, still need to reconnect. What should I do with this situation?{{sticker:sg-zephyr}}

replies.body: This may actually be a ghost game and not a connection issue. It sounds like the game server never accurately reported the end of match, which would be why it keeps trying to reconnect you to a match that no longer exists. These clear up after enough time has passed usually, have you been able to get into another match at all yet?
